description.en: This scroll makes a Soul-Bound item tradable again. Does not work with Soul-Linked items.
description.ar: This scroll makes a Soul-Bound item tradable again. Does not work with Soul-Linked items.
description.br: Este pergaminho torna um item com Vínculo à Alma negociável novamente. Não funciona com itens Ligados à Alma.
description.cns: 这个卷轴能让绑定的物品可以再次交易。但是它对角色绑定的物品无效。
description.de: Mit dieser Rolle kannst du einen seelengebundenen Gegenstand freigeben.
description.fi: This scroll makes a Soul-Bound item tradable again. Does not work with Soul-Linked items.
description.fil: This scroll makes a Soul-Bound item tradable again. Does not work with Soul-Linked items.
description.fr: Ce parchemin vous permet de délier un objet lié à votre personnage.
description.id: Scroll ini membuat item Soul-Bound dapat diperdagangkan lagi. Tidak berfungsi dengan item Soul-Linked.
description.it: This scroll makes a Soul-Bound item tradable again. Does not work with Soul-Linked items.
description.jp: 装備品のキャラクター帰属を解除し、取引が再び可能になる巻物。元から取引不可のアイテムには使用できません。
description.kr: 귀속 아이템을 거래 가능하게 해주는 스크롤이다.
description.nl: This scroll makes a Soul-Bound item tradable again. Does not work with Soul-Linked items.
description.pl: This scroll makes a Soul-Bound item tradable again. Does not work with Soul-Linked items.
description.ru: This scroll makes a Soul-Bound item tradable again. Does not work with Soul-Linked items.
description.sp: Este pergamino hace que un objeto Atado al Alma se pueda intercambiar de nuevo. No funciona con los objetos Vinculados al Alma.
description.sw: This scroll makes a Soul-Bound item tradable again. Does not work with Soul-Linked items.
description.th: สกรอลล์นี้ทำให้รายการ Soul-Bound สามารถแลกเปลี่ยนได้อีกครั้ง ใช้ไม่ได้กับไอเท็มผูกมัดได้
description.tw: 此卷軸使歸屬綁定物品可再次交易。不適用於歸屬鏈接物品。
description.vi: Cuộn này làm cho một vật phẩm bị ràng buộc linh hồn có thể giao dịch trở lại. Không hoạt động với các vật phẩm được Liên kết Linh hồn.
